ygData.subject: Re: Dagger of Marnek n Throwing...
ygData.msgSnippet: Heheh, u play like UO style.  When we go server war, any mage who para and nuke us, we keep throwing GE potions - I carry 30 bottles of GE, 40 GH and 20 GC
ygData.messageBody:
Heheh, u play like UO style. When we go server war, any mage who para and
nuke us, we keep throwing GE potions - I carry 30 bottles of GE, 40 GH and
20 GC whenever I go server war, LOL.

On Friday, 09 July, 1999 1:39 PM, Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy
[SMTP:sccheng@...] wrote:
> last info i heard is that we can equip this dagger into the throwing
slot... so when i auto attack will the char be stupid enough to throw?
>
> also... is shuriken useful? any suggestions as if i should pick up
throwing? will be a useful tool if a wizard attempts to root me... n i can
throw fast enough to disrupt him/her.. saw this in some disussion board...
any comments?
>
> Nic
